name: Not so Silent Halls
description:
Try to escape while avoiding an invisible enemy. Can you solve the puzzle to escape? Or will you try to remove erase the creature?

Submitted for: https://itch.io/jam/gamefreelaejob-jam

Made in 2 days, watch the full build here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLVz7VkEBNnvuSoLiJy_e_A3lyonk8sY-e

Guitar strum sound: guitar-clean-rif by LG
